pr_title: CB-6384 7.1.1 templates are visible even the feature flag is disabled…

timeline.bodyText: a small thing, but there is a plus tab character
timeline.author: sodre90

replies.bodyText: Hm that is strange, my IDEA says that this  the right formatting and it has changed it automatically
replies.author: akanto

timeline.message: CB-6384 7.1.1 templates are visible even the feature flag is disabled, therefore we need to introduce a feature flag on CB as well, alongside with the SDX feature flags
